remarks: Equinumerosity inference from an implicit one-to-one onto function. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2004.)
statement:
en2i.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
en2i.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
en2i.3 $e |- ( x e. A -> C e. _V ) $.
en2i.4 $e |- ( y e. B -> D e. _V ) $.
en2i.5 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y = C ) <-> ( y e. B /\ x = D ) ) $.
en2i $p |- A ~~ B $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C y $.
$d D x $.
